content.rendered:
Home

Enhance Your CRM with Our Salesforce Development Services

Understand your customers well and drive exceptional results with Salesforce that will let you empower your business CRM to deliver unparalleled customer experiences and boost sales.

Get in Touch

Tap into the Power of Salesforce with Us

We are a Salesforce development company in India that offers tailored Salesforce services from development to integration and from Salesforce application development to support & maintenance — and everything in between!  We help you leverage Salesforce’s potential to optimize workflows, drive sales, and improve customer satisfaction. Through team augmentation, we provide skilled Salesforce developers who collaborate with existing teams, offering additional resources and expertise to accelerate project delivery and achieve outstanding results.

Increase

CRM (Customer Relationship Management) skills

Automate

workflows for sales and marketing

Access

customer data analytics and insights in real-time

Improve

communication between the support, sales, and marketing teams

Productivity

effectiveness and productivity across your entire organisation

SALESFORCE DEVELOPMENT

Salesforce Development Services

With our Salesforce professional services, you can completely revamp your company’s operations. We provide specialised solutions to solve your CRM problems, improve workflows, and enhance client interactions, giving your company the tools it needs to grow and succeed.

Salesforce App Development

We develop custom Salesforce apps tailored to your unique business needs to optimize processes and enable seamless data management to improve productivity and customer satisfaction.

Salesforce Consulting

Our team of expert consultants can offer valuable insights and strategies to maximize your Salesforce potential. We aim to ensure effective implementation, streamlined operations, and overall business efficiency.

Salesforce Migration

Seamlessly transition your data and operations to Salesforce with our migration expertise. We help you minimize disruptions and provide a smooth and secure migration experience.

Salesforce Integration

We develop custom Salesforce apps tailored to your unique business needs to optimize processes and enable seamless data management to improve productivity and customer satisfaction.

Salesforce Upgrades

Stay up-to-date with the latest Salesforce features and capabilities. We assist you with system upgrades to guarantee improved performance, security, and access to new features for your company.

Salesforce Support and Maintenance

Keep your company operating efficiently. You can count on our devoted support team to keep your Salesforce environment operating smoothly, resolving issues quickly, and assuring uninterrupted operation.

Salesforce Mobile App Development

We are a trusted Salesforce Development Company specializing in creating and launching Salesforce mobile apps on AppExchange. We offer development solutions and leverage technologies to optimize the potential of mobile apps to ensure a robust user experience.

Salesforce Customization

We help you reach the full potential of Salesforce with our experience and skills. We offer tailored salesforce solutions & support that align the platform precisely with your unique business requirements.

Salesforce App Exchange Development

Leverage our expertise in AppExchange solutions to access a wide array of ready-to-use applications. We assist in enhancing your Salesforce environment with cutting-edge features, reducing development costs, and getting your product to the market fast!

Salesforce Managed Services

You can outsource your project to us to ensure smooth operation and optimal performance. To maximise the effectiveness and value of your CRM investment, we help you with proactive support, regular updates, and continual improvements.

Salesforce Lighting Migration

We enable you to migrate to Salesforce Lightning, maximizing the value of your investment and improving customer service delivery. Our specialty involves creating and optimizing migration processes for any Salesforce instance.

Start today

Hire Our Certified Salesforce Developers and Expand Your Team’s Output

Looking for augmenting your team for your Salesforce project? Our talented professionals are ready to boost your team’s productivity with their expertise. Having years of experience under the belt, our Salesforce developers ensure efficient project delivery within the timeline.  With the help of our team augmentation services, you can speed up your Salesforce projects, access specialised talents, and grow your resources as necessary, producing outstanding results for your company. You can also hire domain specialists such as an administrator, developer, or architect.

Why Hire Our Salesforce
Developers?

1

Extensive working knowledge of JavaScript, as well as expertise with the Lightning Framework and fundamentals of object-oriented programming.

2

Knowledge of creating, integrating, and designing unique Salesforce applications.

3

Capable of managing the application lifecycle, ensuring efficient project development and completion.

4

Excellent written and verbal communication capabilities to effectively collaborate with teams and clients.

5

Demonstrated commitment to exceeding expectations, displaying a positive attitude, and dedication to project success.

6

Advanced knowledge of integrating Salesforce with third-party applications, enhancing the platform’s functionalities.

Certification of Our Salesforce Developers

Our developers hold various certifications that make them highly skilled and knowledgeable in Salesforce development.

Cloud
Consultant

Salesforce

System Architect

Salesforce

Service Cloud Consultatnt

Salesforce

Data Architect

Salesforce

Platform Developer II

Salesforce

Application Architect

Salesforce

Development Lifecycle and Deployment Architect

Salesforce

Experience Cloud Consultant

Salesforce

Identify and Access Management Architect

Salesforce

Salesforce Experience Cloud

Salesforce Service Cloud

Commerce Cloud

Salesforce Sales Cloud

Salesforce IoT Cloud

Salesforce Marketing Cloud

Salesforce Revenue Cloud

Salesforce Apps Cloud

 Salesforce Analytics Cloud

Pardot

Salesforce Einstein

Salesforce Cloud Solutions & Products We Work with

Salesforce Cloud Solutions include a range of powerful technologies designed to address various business needs — from customer service management to marketing automation.  Being the most promising salesforce development & consulting company in India, our expertise is in smoothly integrating and customizing cloud technologies, which will improve your company’s operations, increase productivity, and enhance customer happiness. We guarantee optimised workflows, data-driven insights, and scalable solutions that produce remarkable outcomes for your organisation — all thanks to our professionals who have an in-depth understanding of Salesforce Cloud products.

Our Process

At Codevian, we offer comprehensive Salesforce development services, including team augmentation, to transform your business operations. Our step-by-step process ensures a seamless Salesforce solution tailored to your unique needs.

Start today
1Understanding Your Needs

We start by understanding the goals, procedures, and difficulties of your company. We then conduct in-depth research to gather precise project requirements.

2 Strategic Planning

Our professionals create a strategy roadmap that outlines the Salesforce solutions that support your company’s objectives and improve your CRM’s functionalities.

3 Designing and Development
Using industry best practices and the most recent technologies, our knowledgeable developers create unique Salesforce solutions — whether it’s designing, development or integration.
4 Testing & QA
To ensure a successful solution, we carefully test and validate the Salesforce implementation. Our team of QA experts makes sure that the solution meets your expectations.
5 Support and Maintenance
We remain committed to your Salesforce system long after launch, offering ongoing support and maintenance to keep it effective and up-to-date.

AppExchange

Apex

Aura

Visualforce

Lightning Web Components

GraphQL API

Akita

Als

Salesforce CLI

Our Proficiency in Salesforce Technologies

At Codevian, our expertise in Salesforce includes utilizing the most recent tools and technologies to maximize Salesforce’s capabilities to your advantage. We have extensive experience with Salesforce technologies such as SDK/Tool integration, API use, developer tools, VS Code extensions, and Data Loaders. This deep experience enables us to understand the complexities of your project and design elite Salesforce solutions that meet your exact needs. You may rely on the integration of Salesforce technologies to advance your company with our agile methodology.

Why choose us?

If you choose us for Salesforce development services, your organisation will undergo a transformative shift. Our team of highly skilled Salesforce developers combines in-depth knowledge, creativity, and passion to provide specialised solutions.

Cost-savings

We offer cost-effective Salesforce development services, ensuring businesses save money without compromising on quality or performance.

Top 1% of Talent

Our team comprises expert and experienced Salesforce professionals, delivering top-notch solutions and ensuring exceptional project outcomes.

End-to-end Salesforce Solutions

We provide complete Salesforce support and guide clients from initial planning to final implementation for exceptional results.

Time Zone Friendly

Our global team ensures compatibility and accessibility, making collaboration smooth and efficient across different time zones.

Flexible Models for Staff Augmentation

We offer versatile engagement models, allowing you to hire Salesforce resources on part-time, hourly, monthly, or project-based terms.

Personalized Approach

We always follow a personalized approach and tailor Salesforce development solutions to your needs.

Fast Delivery

Our agile development process enables rapid project delivery, allowing you to see results quickly and gain a competitive edge in the market.

Why Codevian?

Unparalleled Coding Expertise & Innovation

Know More
110+

Clients Catered Globally

Clients Catered Globally

With diverse requirements across many industries. 

35+

Technology Expertise

Technology Expertise

For robust back-end and front-end development. 

320+

Project Delivered

Project Delivered

For mobile apps, web apps, website development, and software development

75+

Skilled Developers

Skilled Developers 

Who leverage their years of experience for innovative solutions & quick project delivery. 

Improving CI/CD Pipeline

A growing e-commerce startup suffered from inefficient sales processes, which resulted in missed opportunities, delayed answers, and customer dissatisfaction

We optimized their sales processes by providing automation, customizable dashboards, and real-time analytics using our specialized Salesforce services. This improved sales efficiency and client engagement, leading to greater revenue and overall business growth.

Customer Retention Challenges

A major industrial company faced increasing customer churn, resulting in significant revenue losses and a declining market position.

We integrated advanced customer analytics and automated personalized retention tactics using Salesforce. This resulted in a significant decrease in churn rates, increased customer loyalty, and rejuvenated the client’s market position.

Low Employee Productivity

Due to inadequate data access and outmoded communication routes, a growing enterprise struggled with continuously low staff productivity.

With our Salesforce solutions, we revolutionized their internal procedures leading to Employees gaining real-time access to essential data and communication.  This resulted in dramatically increased productivity and operational efficiency.

WHAT OUR CLIENTS SAY ABOUT Codevian

Over 1200+ Satisfied Clients and Growing

Entire web development team attention to every detail of our design, layout, color pallet, branding, and presentation. Their communication and response time was excellent and they welcomed our input. Patiently heard all our concerns or recommendations. We continue to use Codevian for our future projects and we highly recommend them.

Michael (Mike) Lancey

President and CEO Mckenzie Chase Management

Codevian team is amazing. My project was fairly complicated and I never had to micromanage. Yogesh and his team communicated perfectly what I asked of them and provided work that was above what was expected. Worth every penny if you want your project done right the first time.

Carole Bacon

CEO at BullHead City web

Great Company This a great company. The pricing is great and they are smart, reliable and passionate. They offer great solutions to complicated problems. They are always available and very flexible.

Sujith Papali

Director at Hireseat LLP

A very professional and responsive approach to achieve customer goals. Developed Very high Quality BtoC Ecommerce app for our Bhaki Domian

Dilip Joshi

AVP - IT & Engineering at Shemaroo Entertainment Ltd

The new tool helps the internal team save over two hours a day, meeting their expectations. Codevian Technologies Pvt. Ltd. provides a high level of customer service and support. The team is hard-working, creative, and dedicated.

Deepesh G.

CEO at Mpos and Brooms

I have an excellent experience with Codevian's delivery teams. They have good, established processes to deliver a high quality product. More importantly, whenever there's any problem, the team is able to quickly respond and work towards the solution

Vinay Darp

CEO at XtentTeam LLP

Salesforce Development Services FAQs

You have got a question? We have an answer! — and worry not if you can’t find what you’re looking for. You can contact us by using the form below and our executive will happily assist you.

Start today
What is salesforce and its benefits?

Salesforce is a leading CRM platform. With the help of faster sales processes, personalised interactions, and real-time customer data. Salesforce gives organisations the opportunity to increase customer happiness and expand their client base.

What does the salesforce developer do?

A Salesforce developer specialises in developing and customising Salesforce apps, integrating external technologies, and developing solutions that are specifically suited to certain business requirements.

Why should I choose Salesforce services?

Choosing Salesforce services will let you improve customer relationship management, effective sales automation, data-driven decision-making, and superior customer service, all of which contribute to higher revenue and better business performance.

What will happen to my current data while migrating to Salesforce?

During Salesforce migration, we ensure your current data is safely migrated to the new system and there is no data loss. Our professionals conduct data mapping and validation to maintain data integrity.

In which industries do you work ?

Our experience spans a wide range of industries, enabling us to meet a variety of client needs and provide personalised Salesforce solutions. Here is a list of industries we cater to (but are not limited to): 

  • Real Estate and Property Management
  • Healthcare and Life Sciences
  • Manufacturing and Supply Chain
  • Automotive and Transportation
  • Financial Services and Banking
  • Technology and IT Services
  • Education and E-learning
  • Retail and E-commerce
  • Professional Services
How do you protect the confidentiality of our project?

To safeguard the sensitive information associated with your project, we place a high priority on confidentiality and implement stringent security measures, such as data encryption and access controls. Non-disclosure agreements further protect the privacy of your project.

Do you offer only salesforce development services or your developers as well?

We offer both! We provide complete Salesforce development services to meet your unique business requirements and precisely address your Salesforce-related difficulties. Additionally, you may increase your resources and jumpstart your project with the help of our qualified Salesforce developers that are accessible for team augmentation.

How much time to develop a Salesforce application?

Depending on the project’s complexity and scope, different Salesforce applications take different amounts of time to build. We’ll provide you with an estimated timetable once we’ve fully grasped your needs in order to guarantee timely project completion.

How much time will it take for you to start the project?

We start the planning and development process as soon as we receive your project requirements, providing a prompt start to your project and accelerating your time-to-market. Our hardworking crew is always willing to take on new tasks and quickly produce excellent outcomes.
